
### quines 


* exercise: write a C program that outputs its source code 

   * (pseudo-code only okay)

* possible in any [ (Turing-complete)]{.my-small} programming language
* called a "quine"

### dumb quine solution


```
#include <stdio.h>
int main(void) {
    char buffer[1024];
    FILE *f = fopen("quine.c", "r");
    size_t bytes = fread(buffer, 1, sizeof(buffer), f);
    fwrite(buffer, 1, bytes, stdout);
    return 0;
}

```
 

* a lot more straightforward!
* but "cheating"
* more like what Vienna does
